decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 21-005-E01 Existing OS Plan; 20-005-E02 Existing Ground and First Floor Plans; 21-005-E03 Existing Loft and Roof Plans; 21-005-E04 Existing Front and Rear Elevations; 21-005-E05 Existing Section A-A; 20-005-P02 Proposed Ground and First Floor Plans; 21-005-P03 Proposed Loft and Rood Plans; 21-005-P04 Proposed Front and Rear Elevations; 21-005-P05  Proposed Section A-A; Planning, Design + Access Statement prepared by Red & White dated May 2021.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

REASON: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition)
